byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt and Matthew Rosenberg contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: American officials say Junaid Hussain, 21-year-old British hacker who infiltrated American military networks and was Islamic State online recruiter, has been killed in Syria by American airstrike.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hussain, a 21-year-old Briton, hacked into American military networks and was a central figure in the Islamic State’s online recruitment campaign.

headline.main: Junaid Hussain, ISIS Recruiter, Reported Killed in Airstrike
headline.print_headline: Briton Who Recruited Online for ISIS Is Reported Killed

snippet: Mr. Hussain, a 21-year-old Briton, hacked into American military networks and was a central figure in the Islamic State’s online recruitment campaign.
